Gale.help: You can call forth a tremendous gust of Gale force winds that knock down foes and deal some Smashing damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

O2_Boost.help: Saturates the air around a targeted ally with rich oxygen, healing his wounds. The O2 Boost can protect a targeted ally from Sleep, Stun and Endurance Drain effects. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Fast
O2_Boost.targetHelp: The O2 Boost has improved your resistance to Sleep, Stun and Endurance Drain effects.

messages.attackerHit: {PlayerDest} is healed for {Damage} points of damage and is protected from Sleep and Disorientation.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} points of damage and protect you from Sleep and Disorientation.

Snow_Storm.help: While active, the chill from this Snow Storm can dramatically Slow the attack and movement speed of the target and all nearby foes. Recharge: Slow
Snow_Storm.targetHelp: Your attack rate and running speed have been reduced by the Snow Storm.
Snow_Storm.attackerHit: You Slow the attack and movement speed of all nearby foes with your {PowerName}.

Charged_Bolts.help: You can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes, dealing some damage and draining some Endurance. Charged Bolts deals light damage but recharges quickly. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
{PlayerSource} shocks you with his {PowerName} and drains some of your Endurance!

Lightning_Bolt.help: You can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe, dealing heavy damage and draining some Endurance. Lightning Bolt deals more damage than Charged Bolts, but recharges more slowly. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
{PlayerSource} shocks you with his {PowerName} and drains some of your Endurance!

Ball_Lightning.help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area of effect, and drains some Endurance from each target it hits. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Ball_Lightning.targetHelp: The Ball Lightning is continuing to electrocute you.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
{PlayerSource} shocks you with his {PowerName} and drains some of your Endurance!

Short_Circuit.help: Releases a burst of electrical energy around you, shocking all nearby foes. This highly accurate discharge deals Moderate damage over time, drains a lot of Endurance from the targets and renders them unable to recover Endurance for quite a while. Additionally, Short Circuit deals extra damage to most robots and mechanical foes. Short Circuit is very effective when used with your other Endurance draining powers. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Short_Circuit.targetHelp: The Short Circuit is continuing to electrocute you. Your Endurance recovery is greatly reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
{PlayerSource} shocks you with his {PowerName} and drains some of your Endurance!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
